title: BudgetBuddy
description:
Developed a personal finance management system utilizing HTML, CSS, Node.js, and MongoDB. The application enables
users to track income and expenses, generate detailed financial reports, and monitor their financial health in real-time. Implemented secure user authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and ensured data integrity with encrypted
storage. The system features a responsive user interface and efficient data handling through MongoDB. Future
enhancements planned include API integrations, mobile app development, and advanced financial analytics.

title: Dine-In Delivery
description: This project is built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is a food delivery website where users can browse food items and place orders. After an order is placed, the admin receives a message containing the user's name, contact information, address, and order details.
